title: Receiving family inheritance and gifts with agency
description: Receiving family inheritance and gifts with agency
content:
Scenario: Receiving family inheritance and gifts with agency
    Given Jordan's grandmother passed away and left Jordan an inheritance
    And Jordan has the right to benefit from the inheritance
    When the family discusses the inheritance
    Then Jordan participates in decisions about the money
    And the personal_agent helps Jordan understand inheritance options
    And if guardianship requires oversight, it's done with dignity
    And Jordan has voice in how the money is used for their benefit
    And Jordan's personhood and rights are fully respected
    And the family_elohim ensures Jordan's interests are protected
